module Ameli def self.parse_releve(doc) res = {} if doc['text'] =~ /Sociale\s*([\d\s]{13,})+/i res['numero-ss'] = $1 res['ss'] = res['numero-ss'].gsub(/\s+/,'') end if doc['text'] =~ /client\s*:\s*(\S+)/i res['ref-client'] = $1 end if doc['text'] =~ /r(?:.|..)gl(?:.|..)\s*le\s*(\d+)\/(\d+)\/(\d+)\s*:\s*(\d+),(\d+)/i res['date'] = Time.local($3.to_i, $2.to_i, $1.to_i) res['montant'] = $4.to_i * 100 + $5.to_i end if doc['text'] =~ /r(?:.|..)gl(?:.|..)\s*le\s*(\d+)\/(\d+)\/(\d+)\s*au\s*destinataire\s*(.*)\s*:\s*(\d+),(\d+)/i res['date'] = Time.local($3.to_i, $2.to_i, $1.to_i) res['montant'] = $5.to_i * 100 + $6.to_i res['destinataire'] = $4 end if doc['text'] =~ /r(?:.|..)f\s*(\d+)\s*(\d+)/i res['ref'] = "#$1-#$2" # Voir un jour pour scanner tout le document et en extraire de multiples references... end
return res end
def self.fetch(fetcher, creds, docs) p [creds, docs] fetcher.get("http://qt.moqksdmlk") do |res| if res.ok? p [res, res.raw_headers] p res.links else p :error p res.error end end end end
